title: Halloween Show ////// 59
description:
Halloween Show ////// 59


Truecrimegarage.com


Tonight we are throwing a big Halloween party right in the garage and you are officially invited. Halloween is the perfect time of year for taking in a really great horror film or hearing your friend tell a scary story. The truth is when you have True Crime who needs fiction. Tonight we party but we also discuss our favorite True Crime Documentaries like "Making a Murderer," "The Jinx," and "Who Took Johnny." Join us for drinks and much more but make sure that you come to party!

Cheers, Nic & The Captain


Beer of the Week - Octoberfest by Brooklyn Brewery, Brooklyn, New York

Garage Grade - 4-1/2 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
